text: One of my clients is using a 3rd party embed for their careers listing, but it doesn't show up on Safari. Can anyone help me debug this or try to point me in the right direction? Here is the <https://www.smartersorting.com/careers|page> which works in Chrome but not Safari.

I have a new Insurance client that uses !Broker Briefcase" for their inhouse software to manage clients, prospects and policies, which includes a CRM. Has anyone come across this before? I am wondering what my chances are of replicating its functionality with HubSpot. Thanks in advance.
Looks to be a CSP configuration issue
Hi, how can I get all the meetings from the api(node)?
<@U26BLKGE4> could you point me towards a resource on how to fix this? I've never had to update a CPS. Is it in HubSpot settings or code?

<@U022FJKR4CQ> I’d start here, there are some links to follow for more steps: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/Releases-and-Updates/Custom-Domain-Security-Settings-Now-Available-Across-All-Tiers/ba-p/519837>
<@U26BLKGE4> awesome thank you so much I really appreciate your help!

Hello,
I am trying to create a workflow through the API. The workflow has an "internal email notification". I am supposed to add this in actions but somehow I cannot find any example action for internal email notification. My issue is same as mentioned on this thread: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/Adding-an-internal-notification-to-a-workflow-using-the-API/td-p/380345>
Please let me know if you have any suggestions.
In general where can I see all possible Actions Types in Workflow (JSON format)
Hi I am new to the HubSpot api wanted to know few details.
Does the developer account and the production app share data or we need to install the developer app as private app in the prod HubSpot to access the actual data
